Text: why does the titles always say "Screener" when they clearly are a cam?
@erra TS Screener means video from cam recording and audio from other source (normally better than full vid/audio CAM).

"screener" means it was sent out for screening for awards andor reviews. not that is was recorded by a camera from a screen. these people online are just too fucking stupid and the term has come to mean this by dumbasses.
